modName: Psijic Robes Retexture - Keeper of the Ogma HD
summary: Personal retexture of the Psijic robe+hood with some elements from the Ogma Infinium and the Ritual of Illusion.
descriptionHtml:
UPDATE:
- Uploaded the Keeper of the Ogma retexture for the Konahrik hood as optional file.

- Uploaded the Keeper of the Ogma Retexture in HIGH DEFINITION quality. Moved the Low Definition in old version (any case I suggest everyone to download the HD one).

[center][img]http://i67.tinypic.com/2jfxhsz.jpg[/img]
[i][size=4]Keeper of the Ancient Tome of Knowledge[/size][/i]

High Definition Retexture of the great Psijic robe.
Element taken from Ogma Infinium and Arcane Scribblings.
Text on the arms are taken from the Ritual book of Illusion.[/center]

You can have Spijic Robes only trough Console Commands:

press ~ [tilde] to open console
type "player.additem XXXXXXXX 1"
replace X with
Robe: 00065B94
Hood: 00065B99
Gloves: 00065B9D
Boots: 00065B9B

If you use Konahrik with the Psjic robes this is my first mod that brought the first idea for this retexture ( http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34872).

Thanks to PriestMorekai from Deviantart.com ( priestmorokei.deviantart.com/) for 3 elements composition (made with Bethesda graphics) . Exactly the mandala on the back and the central one in the lower part of the robe (different the male one from the female one). Thanks a lot for the inspiration. I saved a lot of time!

[center]Textures taken from the official High Resolution Texture Pack
RESOLUTION:

Robes+Hood:2048x2048[/center]

All credits to Bethesda

Enjoy and FUS RO DAH

[center][img]http://i68.tinypic.com/54sy8.jpg[/img]
